name: Testing stock_list function
description:
Testing stock_list function with various test data [with list_of_art=['BKWRK 125', 'BTSQZ 239', 'BBART 350', 'DRTYM 060'], list_of_cat=['B', 'D'], expected='(B : 714) - (D : 60)'].

        :return:
descriptionHtml:
Codewars badge:

Test Description:

You will be given a stock-list (e.g. : L) and a list of categories in capital letters. Your task is to verify that the function finds all the books of L with codes belonging to each category of M and to sum their quantity according to each category.

steps.name: Enter test data (['BKWRK 125', 'BTSQZ 239', 'BBART 350', 'DRTYM 060'], ['B', 'D']) and verify the expected output ((B : 714) - (D : 60)) vs actual result ((B : 714) - (D : 60))
